nodes.speaker: earth_commander_holt
nodes.text: Captain, my board is lit up like a festival. Your ship is emitting low-level quantum radiation, your crew's biosigns are erratic, and the gate signature persists. What in God's name did you do out there?

choices.text: We made a pact with the entity in the wreck. It was the only way to stabilize the gate.
[Deception] "We initiated a temporary truce with a local intelligence. It's a standard first contact protocol."
[Reconnaissance] Maya, is this channel secure? Any signs of eavesdropping?
[Previous Loop] "Commander, I made a pact because in every timeline where I don't, Earth falls. This is the only way."

nodes.speaker: earth_commander_holt
nodes.text: A pact? You unilaterally entered into an agreement with an unknown, non-terrestrial power? Do you have any idea what you've done? This is a potential existential threat!

choices.text: It was a calculated risk. And it worked.
[Show signs of corruption] "It was necessary. The song is wide... and we must all learn to sing it."

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: The channel is secure, Captain. However, I am detecting a high level of background radiation consistent with void energies... originating from Commander Holt's location.

nodes.speaker: earth_commander_holt
nodes.text: A 'local intelligence'... Fine. Transmit the full treaty for review. We'll see if your 'standard protocol' holds up under scrutiny.

nodes.speaker: earth_commander_holt
nodes.text: ...What did you just say? Repeat that, Captain. On whose authority are you making such claims?

nodes.speaker: earth_commander_holt
nodes.text: I want every detail. What were the terms? What did you give them? What did they give you? And I want your entire crew submitted for psychological evaluation upon your return.

nodes.speaker: science_officer_kim
nodes.body_language: Kim's eyes glaze over for a second.
nodes.text: The Commander is afraid of the harmony. He does not wish to be part of the whole.

nodes.speaker: earth_commander_holt
nodes.text: What was that? Officer Kim, are you alright? Captain, what have you done to your crew? This is not a debriefing anymore. This is a quarantine order. You are not to approach Earth.

nodes.speaker: earth_commander_holt
nodes.text: You hold his gaze, your certainty unwavering. He sees something in your eyes... something ancient. He breaks contact first. '...I see. Proceed with caution, Captain. And keep this channel open.'

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You've managed to downplay the pact, but your actions will be under intense scrutiny.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have been placed under official inquiry. Your career, and your freedom, are on the line.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: Your crew's strange behavior has resulted in a quarantine order. You are now an exile.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: Your impossible knowledge has convinced Holt to trust you, for now. You have a secret ally at the heart of Earth Command.
